c:Label.text: *Production Plant 1 Product - minimum run and constraint.
*Production Plant 2 Product - minimum run and constraint.
*Production Plant 3 Product - minimum run and constraint.
*Production Plant 4 Product - minimum run and constraint.
*Production Plant 5 Product - minimum run and constraint.

c:Label.tooltip: Be it 2 high to 1 high, a loss of space due to project needs, stock build at an already busy time of year, etc.
Are we going to have to move and consolidate? Can we complete ex-factory moves?
Are they robust enough to prove that we can use any or all sites?
This being an impact on us having to try to manage stock through or risk of us sitting on stock for long periods of time.

c:Label.text: *Timing of production / repack to first despatches
c:Label.tooltip: This could be either too tight or too loose (we are going to sit on stock).
